abstract: A second Singapore bank has challenged HSBC in the bidding for ING’s private banking operations in Asia, the Dutch financial daily Het Financieele Dagblad reported.
snippet: A second Singapore bank has challenged HSBC in the bidding for ING’s private banking operations in Asia, the Dutch financial daily Het Financieele Dagblad reported.
lead_paragraph: A second Singapore bank has challenged HSBC in the bidding for ING‘s private banking operations in Asia, the Dutch financial daily Het Financieele Dagblad reported, citing unidentified sources.

headline.main: ING’s Asia Assets Said to Draw More Bids
